Class GameBoard

public class GameBoard extends Object
this class holds the array version of gameboard and its functions like checking for wins

  • Constructor Details

    • GameBoard

      public GameBoard(int Row, int Col, int Win)
      Constructs a game board that is empty, and uses an array to make the board. This constructor initializes a new instance of the gameboard class with a 2D array of blank spaces The game board is being represented as a grid with rows and columns, where each position is initially empty.

  • Method Details

    • dropToken

      public void dropToken(char p, int c)
      This function places a token in a specific column, allowing it to drop until it collides with amother token
      Parameters:
      c - an integer, the column where the token is to be placed ( 0 <= c <= maxColumn-1)
      p - a character, either 'X' or 'O', which represents the player's token

    • whatsAtPos

      public char whatsAtPos(BoardPosition pos)

      Parameters:
